artist: Silversmith: Lionel Alfred Crichton; Retailer: Crichton Bros.
creditline: Gift of Jan and Bill Spoor
description: octagonal body; panels on body decorated with various figures, each with a bird flying overhead alternating with plants and architectural elements; flowers around shoulder
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

on bottom, stamped: [CRICHTON BROS./ 22. OLD BOND ST/ LONDON];
on bottom, incised: [224 (444)]; on bottom, stamped: [LAC (rampant lion) (cat\'s head)]; under cover, stamped: [SG (rampant lion)(cat\'s head)]
on side, stamped: [LAC(rampant lion) (cat\'s head) O]
object_name: Flask with screw top, from a toilette set
title: Flask with screw top, from a toilette set
